title: Disk Scheduling Algorithms
subject: Operating Systems
theory:
Ordering I/O requests to minimize **Seek Time** (Head movement). 
- **FCFS**: Fair, slow.
- **SSTF**: Shortest Seek First (Greedy).
- **SCAN**: Elevator algorithm (Back and forth).
- **C-SCAN**: Circular (Typewriter, one direction).

common_mistakes.correction: These matter for HDD (Moving parts). SSDs have 0 seek time, so FCFS/deadline is fine.
